title: [Frozen Garden, Glade]
description: A small river meanders through this wooded glade, the sun sparkling and reflecting from its frozen surface.  Several tall evergreens climb towards the sky, their limbs drooping under the weight of accumulated snow and ice.

A small river meanders through this wooded glade, moonbeams sparkling and reflecting from its frozen surface.  Several tall evergreens climb towards the sky, their limbs drooping under the weight of accumulated snow and ice.
